attributes.action: Let the police of the United Kingdom have the authority to arrest youth's instead of taking them home and giving them a caution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition to give the police in the United Kingdom the authority to detain youths instead of taking them home with a caution.
I have formed this petition because recently my school has been vandalised and damaged and I have been told that they were taken home and cautioned.
I think it's time that they were dealt with in a manner fitting of this country's judicial system.
